name: A Plea for Mother Tree
description:
Explore an ecosystem inside the Essence Tree, affectionately referred to as the Mother Tree by its denizens. Life is mostly peaceful in the tree, but there are dark clouds on the horizon. It's up to the player to guide Froot to make the right decision when the time comes. 

Made for the I Can't Write but want to Tell a Story game jam hosted by Charlmes. 

Note: The game may have some bugs. We'll be working to fix those even after submission. Please let us know if you find any.
